title.narrative: Information and Communication Technology (ICT) guidance for African Professional Accountancy Organizations

description.narrative:
A project to develop guidance on Professional Accountancy Organization (PAO) Information Communication Technology systems. Delivered by the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (ACCA) and the Institute of Certified Public Accountants of Kenya (ICPAK).
Launched under the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC) Professional Accounting Organization (PAO) Capacity Building Program funded by DFID.

To develop a guide on general principles and good practices in designing and procuring an ICT system for a developing PAO and providing tailored support to specific African PAOs to identify fit-for-purpose solutions.
